result: If it is worth being loved than feared or feared than loved? It is answered that both would be to desire; But because it is difficult to gather them, it is much safer to be feared than loved when one of the two will be missing. For men can be said, of a general way, that they are ungrateful, volatile, simulators, cowardly and avid with profit, and while they are well are entirely yours, they offer them blood, goods, life and children, when , as I said above, the danger is far away; But when he arrives, they revolt.
